data.comment: Bournemouth take a 0-1 lead thanks to Junior Stanislas.
In the minute 37, Goal! Rotherham go level at 1-1 through Freddie Ladapo in Rotherham.
At AESSEAL New York Stadium, Lloyd Kelly has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Michael Ihiekwe (Rotherham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second half has started at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Freddie Ladapo.
In the minute 52, Rotherham's Michael Smith has been booked in Rotherham.
Diego Rico Salguero is replacing Dan Gosling for the away team.
Bournemouth make their second substitution with Sam Surridge replacing Adam Smith.
In the minute 63, Goal! The away team draw level at 2-2 through Dominic Solanke.
Paul Warne (Rotherham) is making a first substitution, with Trevor Clarke replacing Matthew Olosunde.
Jefferson Lerma (Bournemouth) has received a yellow card from Geoff Eltringham.
In the minute 84, David Brooks is booked for the away team.
Paul Warne is making the team's second substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with Kyle Vassell replacing Freddie Ladapo.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
